content: Give me a list of 18 words that have 'ible' somewhere in them.

Sure! Here's a list of 18 words that contain "ible" somewhere in them:

1._accessible
2.comprehensible
3.responsible
4.possible
5.resilient
6.sensible
7.capable
8.terrible
9.hospitable
10.portable
11.sustainable
12.legible
13.edible
14.reversible
15.invisible
16.suitable
17.durable
18.capricious

I hope this helps! If you need more words or have any other questions, feel free to ask.
